product.name: Blockchain Grants
product.description: Launch a fully-featured blockchain grants directory with built-in analytics, memberships, and AI-powered insights.

overview.content: Create a powerful blockchain grants platform with comprehensive features including analytics, content management, membership systems, and AI support. Built for SEO with user engagement features like upvotes, bookmarks, and personalized recommendations. Seamlessly sync with Notion and customize with flexible component sections.

howItWorks.content: Users can browse, upvote, and bookmark grants while logged in. Staff can suggest personalized listings to users. Features include: Analytics dashboard, Forms builder, Memberships & Paywall, Boring AI support, Custom script integration, Component-based sections (carousel, testimonials, pricing), Branding options, Notion sync, and Custom domain setup.

configuration.content:
1. Set up your branding and domain
2. Configure membership tiers and paywalls
3. Customize sections using the component creator
4. Enable AI features and staff suggestions
5. Set up Notion sync for content
6. Add custom scripts and iframe embeds
7. Configure analytics tracking
8. Customize forms and user engagement features

configuration.content: Subscribe for full access, customize your interests, and get weekly insights delivered to your inbox.

product.name: Product Hunt

overview.content: Product Hunt surfaces the best new tech products, every day. It's a place for product-loving enthusiasts to share and geek out about the latest mobile apps, websites, hardware projects, and tech creations.

configuration.content: Get a profile, follow topics of interest, and stay updated with daily newsletters.
